Auth.consent: I confirm my understanding of the personal data processing terms in Bratislava. I'm aware that the parking policy conditions may change under Regulation No. 6/2023 and the Operating Regulations.
Auth.verificationText: Continue by entering 6-digit code from message we’ve sent.

AddParkingCards.instructions: If you are registered in PAAS, enter the e-mail address you entered when creating your account. Thanks to it, we will be able to upload all your parking cards.

PurchaseScreen.title: Ticket purchase
PurchaseScreen.paymentFailedText:
Your payment has failed. 
Please try again.
PurchaseScreen.paymentSuccessfulText: Your payment ticket has been paid.

VehiclesScreen.title: Vehicles
VehiclesScreen.licencePlateDuplicate: Vehicle with this license plate already exists.

deleteVehicleConfirmModal.title: Delete vehicle
deleteVehicleConfirmModal.message: Do you really want to delete vehicle {{licencePlate}}?

addVehicleConfirmModal.title: Add vehicle
addVehicleConfirmModal.message: Do you really want to add vehicle {{licencePlate}}?
addVehicleConfirmModal.licencePlateFormatWarning: Please, check the license plate carefully.

pushNotificationsAboutToEnd.title: Parking about to end
pushNotificationsAboutToEnd.description: We will send you push notification 15 minutes before your parking ends

pushNotificationsToEnd.title: Parking ended
pushNotificationsToEnd.description: We will send you push notification when your parking ends

emailNotificationsAboutToEnd.title: Parking about to end
emailNotificationsAboutToEnd.description: We will send you e-mail 15 minutes before your parking ends

emailNotificationsToEnd.title: Parking ended
emailNotificationsToEnd.description: We will send you e-mail when your parking ends

PaymentMethods.title: Payment methods
PaymentMethods.paymentGate: Payment card / Apple Pay / Google Pay

Tickets.title: Parking tickets
Tickets.noActiveTicketsText: After you buy your parking ticket it will show here.

terminationModal.title: Terminate parking ticket
terminationModal.message: Are you sure you want to terminate your parking ticket?

ParkingCards.title: Parking cards
ParkingCards.paasEmailsList: Choose an e-mail to continue and show cards that are attached
ParkingCards.noEmailsText: To add your cards to the app, please connect with your PAAS account.
ParkingCards.noActiveCardsText: All parking cards expired. Once you’ll buy new parking card, it will show here.
ParkingCards.removeEmailText: Are you sure you want to remove this e-mail address? Without an e-mail address, it will not be possible to view or use your parking cards.

verified.title: Parking cards added
verified.text: Your parking cards e-mail {{email}} has been added. You can see your cards in the Parking cards section.

verified-no-cards.title: No parking cards
verified-no-cards.text:
We apologize, but no parking cards were found for the e-mail address {{email}}.

Please contact paas.sk support.

link-expired.title: Link expired
link-expired.text:
We are sorry, but link to verify your e-mail has expired. Resend e-mail to {{email}} and verify it again.

Click on Verify button in the e-mail to approve verification and we will then add parking cards directly to the app.

ZoneBottomSheet.title: Where are you parking?
ZoneBottomSheet.noZoneSelected: No parking zones found. Use search or place the pin to a parking zone nearby.

Errors.422: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
Errors.axiosGeneric: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
